attributes.action: Make basic life skills(finance and mortgages) etc mandatory in secondary schools
attributes.additional_details: So many people post-16 face the challenges of adult life with little to no knowledge on how to maintain a healthy finance, and how to buy a house for example. These to me are seen as basics on how to stay free from debt and overwhelmingness of a newly formed adult with little help or teaching.
attributes.background: Add life skills to education system so that people have the best chances of surviving adult life free from debt and other financial difficulties, once left school.

rejection.details:
Financial education is already part of the National Curriculum

https://www.fincap.org.uk/en/articles/schools#:~:text=In%20England%2C%20financial%20education%20is,part%20of%20citizenship%20and%20maths.&text=All%20schools%20are%20expected%20to,provided%20by%20the%20PSHE%20Association.
